name: KiaNo Rivs
description:
A game made for Nokia 3310 Jam.

Made only with two colors in the style of old nokia games.

It is a top down endless shooter with the goal to get the biggest score possible. You can choose between three difficulties and each one gives you more score than the last one. How far can you go?

Controls: Arrow Keys to move, W, A, S, D to shoot in a direction, Escape to go to the main menu. In the menu, UP and DOWN on the arrow keys to move, and W, A, S or D to confirm your selection.
